author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons riding motorcycles were killed as their vehicles collided on Dindigul-Natham Main Road at Sanarpatti near here on Sunday.

The deceased were S. Azhagarsamy (25) of Manapparai in Tiruchi district and G. Mahalingam (20) of Ramanathapuram.

Azhagarsamy, who was returning home on his motorcycle from Vadugapatti after meeting a relative, hit the two-wheeler of Mahalingam, and died on the spot.

Mahalingam was rushed to hospital, but he died on the way.

Sanarpatti police have registered a case.
title: Two killed as bikes collide
